document.full_text: american pat perez birdied the last two holes of the treacherous 'green mile' finish for a seven-under-par 65 and a two-stroke lead at the halfway point of the quail hollow championship on friday.
document.title: pat perez surges into halfway lead at quail hollow
lines_and_colors: american pat perez birdied the last two holes of the treacherous 'green mile' finish for a seven-under-par 65 and a two-stroke lead at the halfway point of the quail hollow championship on friday.
